entries.title: Data behind historic number of migrants reaching US borders and reasons why: ANALYSIS
entries.description: Crises across the Western Hemisphere continue to fuel the record migration to the U.S.

entries.title: Slain Idaho student's parents desperate for answers: 'Where are you? Who are you?'
entries.description: The parents of 21-year-old Kaylee Goncalves, one of the four slain University of Idaho students, are desperate for answers.

entries.title: Mbappe, France advance to World Cup final, beat Morocco 2-0
entries.description: France will be competing in the final for the fourth time.

entries.title: Jury deliberates ex-officer's fate in murder trial of Black woman in her home
entries.description: Closing arguments began Wednesday in the murder trial of former police officer Aaron Dean for the fatal shooting of Atatiana Jefferson.

entries.title: WATCH:  Inspiring marching band gets big surprise
entries.description: Band director James Perry at Eastern High School in Washington, D.C., opens up how much the band does for its students despite the financial obstacles they face.

entries.title: City settles discrimination lawsuit from Black and Latino renters
entries.description: The Department of Justice has reached a nearly $1 million settlement over illegal evictions of Black and Latino renters.

entries.title: Full court won't rehear appeals over Ohio State sex abuse
entries.description: An appeals court panel's decision that revived unsettled federal lawsuits against Ohio State University over decades-old sexual abuse by a team doctor won't be reconsidered by the full court

entries.title: Man gets 2.5 years for buying gun used to kill Chicago cop
entries.description: An Indiana man who pleaded guilty to making an illegal “straw” purchase of a handgun later used to kill a Chicago police officer was sentenced Wednesday to 2 1/2 years in prison

entries.title: Florida manatees facing starvation fed through program
entries.description: Along Florida’s East Coast, threatened manatees that are facing starvation are fed through an unprecedented program started last year

entries.title: Federal Reserve slows interest rate hikes with 0.5% increase
entries.description: The move from the Federal Reserve signals confidence that inflation will continue to fall.

entries.title: Missouri school district votes to adopt 4-day school week
entries.description: A Missouri school district has voted to switch to a four-day school week from a five-day school week in an attempt to attract and retain staff.

entries.title: Malagò: 2026 Olympics on track after difficult few years
entries.description: Italian Olympic Committee president Giovanni Malagò is confident everything is on track for the country’s first Olympics in two decades but admits that the past few years have been akin to “running a marathon with a backpack.”

entries.title: Police: 2 officers slain in Mississippi; shooter also dead
entries.description: Authorities say two police officers in coastal Mississippi were shot and killed by a woman early Wednesday as they checked on a call at a motel

entries.title: Twitter suspends account that tracked owner Elon Musk's jet
entries.description: The account used publicly available data to track Elon Musk’s private jet.

entries.title: Argentina airline adds 2 more flights for World Cup final
entries.description: Two extra flights will take fans from Buenos Aires to Qatar for the final.

entries.title: Stephen 'tWitch' Boss, 'The Ellen DeGeneres Show' alum, dead at 40
entries.description: "The Ellen DeGeneres Show" alum Stephen "tWitch" Boss has died at the age of 40.

entries.title: WATCH:  Soccer fans celebrate after Argentina's victory over Croatia
entries.description: Massive crowds filled the streets of Buenos Aires after Argentina's victory over Croatia in the World Cup semifinals.

entries.title: GM recalls over 825K vehicles to fix daytime running lights
entries.description: General Motors is recalling more than 825,000 SUVs and cars in the U.S. and Canada because the daytime running lights may not turn off when the headlights are on

entries.title: 2 dead as tornado hits Louisiana town
entries.description: A woman and her son were killed after a tornado swept through a Louisiana town, officials said.

entries.title: American freed from Russian-controlled territory by Ukrainian intelligence
entries.description: American Suedi Murekezi has just been freed from Russian-controlled territory by a team from Ukraine’s military intelligence and is now being driven to Kyiv.

entries.title: US military creates space unit in SKorea amid NKorea threats
entries.description: The U.S. military has formally launched a space force unit in South Korea, a move that will likely enable Washington to better monitor its rivals North Korea, China and Russia

entries.title: Mom whose son was thrown off a balcony at Mall of America speaks out
entries.description: In April 2019, Kari Hoffmann witnessed a man toss her 5-year-old son over a 3rd floor balcony.

entries.title: UK inflation eases, remains close to 40-year high
entries.description: U.K. inflation eased in November as gasoline and diesel prices rose more slowly than the previous month

entries.title: Pope urges 'humble' Christmas, with savings sent to Ukraine
entries.description: Pope Francis is calling for a “humble” Christmas this year, with savings from reduced spending on gifts donated to Ukrainians

entries.title: Colorado Springs shooting survivors to speak before Congress
entries.description: Colorado Springs shooting survivors will speak before Congress on Wednesday about anti-LGBTQ violence and legislation.

entries.title: 10 years after Sandy Hook, school shooting survivors form network of support
entries.description: School shooting survivors across generations write letters to future survivors.

entries.title: 10 years after Sandy Hook, school shooting survivors form network of support
entries.description: School shooting survivors across generations write letters to future survivors.

entries.title: Authorities report explosions in center of Ukrainian capital
entries.description: Ukrainian authorities say Russian drone strikes damaged five buildings in the capital, Kyiv, even as air defense thwarted many more

entries.title: Winter US storm brings warnings of more tornadoes, blizzards
entries.description: A destructive winter storm is marching across the United States

entries.title: Mississippi set to execute man for killing 16-year-old girl
entries.description: A Mississippi man who pleaded guilty to raping and killing a 16-year-old girl is scheduled to be put to death

entries.title: States with abortion bans already had high maternal death rates, fewer doctors: Study
entries.description: States who imposed strict abortion laws this year were already more likely to have significantly higher maternal and infant death rates, a new study found

entries.title: More than 3,500 Americans have died from long COVID during pandemic, CDC data finds
entries.description: A new report from the CDC published early Wednesday found long COVID was the underlying or contributing cause of death for more than 3,500 Americans.

entries.title: Lawmakers announce 'framework' on bill to keep gov't open
entries.description: Lawmakers leading the negotiations on a bill to fund the federal government for the current fiscal year say they’re reached agreement on a “framework” that should allow them to complete work on the bill over the next week and avoid a government shutdown

entries.title: Exam finds famed LA mountain lion may have been hit by car
entries.description: Wildlife experts say the famous Hollywood-roaming mountain lion known as P-22 is drastically underweight and probably was struck and hurt by a car

entries.title: WATCH:  Drivers watch as tornado makes its way across Texas highway
entries.description: Motorists in Grapevine, Texas nearly ran into the path of a tornado.

entries.title: FBI report shows high hate crime levels, but data missing
entries.description: Hate crimes in the U.S. remained relatively high last year after a surge not seen in nearly two decades, according to a new FBI report that experts say is actually an undercount because thousands of police departments didn’t report their data

entries.title: EXPLAINER: How Elon Musk is changing what you see on Twitter
entries.description: What you’re seeing in your feed on Twitter is changing

entries.title: Civil rights icon John Lewis, more to be honored with new USPS stamps
entries.description: John Lewis, Ruth Bader Ginsburg and more will be honored with postage stamps next year.

entries.title: 7 charged with international smuggling for Russia
entries.description: The charges, unsealed Tuesday in the Eastern District of New York, revealed the ring operated since at least 2017.

entries.title: 8 hurt in 3-alarm fire at NYPD facility
entries.description: Eight people were hurt after a massive three-alarm fire broke out in a warehouse in Brooklyn, New York, on Tuesday morning, the FDNY said.
